name: market_get_ipo_center
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webull.
Tool description: Query public data for investment products including stocks, fractional shares, options, ETFs, and ADRs as on webull.com
API description: Fetches IPO center information for a specified region.

regionid.description: The ID of the region for which the IPO center information is to be fetched, obtained from the `/regions/list` endpoint.

status.description: The status filter for the IPO information. It can be one of the following: 'filing', 'pricing', or 'buying'. Default is 'filing'.
